text:
we just submitted <https://app.HubSpot.com/ecosystem/9096875/marketplace/apps/sales/sales-enablement/leadsigma-237080|our app> last week.  this <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/app-marketplace-listing-requirements|help doc> is really thorough.

1. when you click submit it actually tells you what place in line you are and you can watch it decrease to get an idea of time.
2. within a day turnaround on updating the listing, we missed the listing install instructions.
3. we have both free and paid and didnâ€™t notice a difference
